images.name: AVANI HOTEL
images.content: Completed the AVANI Hotel project at Ibn Battuta Mall, Dubai, UAE. NAKHEEL PJSC was the client, and Dar Al-Handasah provided consulting. Parkway International Construction Company L.L.C. served as the main contractor, concluding the project successfully.

images.name: GHALIA Tower
images.content: Completed the GHALIA Tower project in Jumeirah Village, Dubai. DAMAC was the client, with consulting by Engineering Consortium Consulting Engineers. The main contractor, Reem Capital Contracting LLC, successfully concluded the project through conversion.

images.name: AKOYA COURSE COMMUNITY-HOTEL
images.content: Completed the Akoya Course Community-Hotel Apartment project in Dubai, UAE. DAMAC Crescent Properties L.L.C was the client, with consulting by Incorporated Consultants. The main contractor, Naresco Contracting. L.L.C, successfully concluded the project through conversion.

images.name: AL ZAHIA
images.content: MEP conversion for Al Zahia's 204-villa residential project in Al Yasmeen, Sharjah, UAE is now completed. Majid Al Futtaim was the client, with Engineering Consultants Group and United Engineering Construction Company LLC handling consulting and contracting.
